member.summary: Try connect to pinpad in the specified serial port.

member.summary: Disconnect from the attached serial port.

member.summary: Sends a symbolic stream of bytes, to verify if the connection is OK.
member.returns: Whether the connection is alive or not.

member.summary: Whether the connection is opened or not. This property determines wheter something can be sent to the device or not. Should be verified after every attempting to send data to the pinpad.

member.summary: Track1, separator between different information. Based on ISO 7810/7811.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Mapper.MagneticStripeTrackMapper.EXPIRATIONDATE_INDEX_ON_TRACK1
member.summary: Track 1 is made of several information divided by a separator. This is the index of card expiration date on track 1.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Mapper.MagneticStripeTrackMapper.EXPIRATIONDATE_INDEX_ON_TRACK2
member.summary: Track 2 is made of several information divided by a separator. This is the index of card expiration date on track 2.

member.summary: Card expiration date string length.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Mapper.MagneticStripeTrackMapper.PAN_INDEX
member.summary: Track 2 is made of several information divided by a separator. This is the index of the Primary Account Number (PAN) on track 1.

member.summary: Track 1 is made of several information divided by a separator. This is the index of cardholder name on track 1.

member.exception: Thrown when womething went wrong internally.

member.summary: Pinpad controller, containing all methods needed to perform a transaction.

member.summary: Facade through which pinpad communication is made.

member.summary: Primary constructor.
member.param: Connection through which the pinpad will be looked for.

member.summary: Alternative constructor, setter of all mandatory parameters and responsible for data validation.
member.param: Connection through which the pinpad will be looked for.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.PinpadController.RemoveCard(System.String,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.DisplayPaddingType)
member.summary: On Pinpad screen, alternates between "RETIRE O CART√ÉO" and parameter 'message' received, until card removal.
member.param: Message to be shown on pinpad screen. Must not exceed 16 characters. This message remains on Pinpad screen after card removal.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.PinpadController.ReadCard(Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.TransactionType,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Read basic card information, that is, brand id, card type, card primary account number (PAN), cardholder name and expiration date.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.PinpadController.ReadPassword(System.Decimal,System.String,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.CardType)
member.summary: If cardholder card needs password, than prompts it. Otherwise, nothing is done.
member.param: Card type, defining how the card must be read.
member.returns: An object Pin, containing pin block (cardholder password), Key Serial Number (KSN, determining pin block DUKPT encryption key) and if pin verification is online.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.PinpadController.Validate(Pinpad.Sdk.Connection.BasePinpadConnection,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadDisplay,Pinpad.Sdk.EmvTable.IPinpadTable)
member.summary: Responsible for validating mandatory parameters.
member.param: Connection through which the pinpad will be looked for.
member.exception: Thrown when a parameter is null (specifies which is).

member.summary: Connection handler, is responsible for specifying the connection through which the pinpad will be looked for.

member.summary: Display handler, responsible for presenting messages in a pinpad device.

member.summary: Keyboard handler, responsible for getting inputs from pinpad keyboard.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.PinpadController.Infos
member.summary: Information about the pinpad device connected.

member.summary: Last status returned from a pinpad command.

member.summary: Sends reading command using ABECS when card have a chip.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.EmvPinReader.Validate(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Validates parameter used on internal processing.
member.exception: When one parameter is not null, but contains invalid data.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.MagneticStripePinReader.Read(Pinpad.Sdk.EmvTable.IPinpadFacade,System.String,System.Decimal,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.Pin@)
member.summary: Read security information when card has no chip - magnetic stripe only.
member.param: Primary Account Number printed on the card.
member.returns: Wheter is an online transaction or not.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.MagneticStripePinReader.SendGpn(Pinpad.Sdk.EmvTable.IPinpadFacade,System.String,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Sends reading command using ABECS in case of a magnetic stripe card. Unexpected behavior if amount is too large (over quadrillion).
member.param: Primary Account Number printed on the card.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.MagneticStripePinReader.GetAmountLabel(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Responsible for returning a formatted string to be shown on the pinpad screen when the cardholder should input his password. If the formatted string is too large so it overtake pinpad linewidth, then returns only the transaction amount. This method DOES NOT treat this situation: if the amount itself overtakes pinpads linewidth. (behavior unexpected)
member.returns: Formatted string to be shown on pinpad screen when the cardholder should input his password.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.MagneticStripePinReader.Validate(System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: Validates parameters used on internal processing.
member.exception: When one parameter is not null, but contains invalid data.

member.summary: Responsible for getting pinpad security information (Pin Block and Key Serial Number(KSN)).

member.summary: MK index or DUKPT register.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.PinReader.PASSWORD_MINIMUM_LENGTH
member.summary: Cardholder password minimum length.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.PinReader.PASSWORD_MAXIMUM_LENGTH
member.summary: Cardholder maximum length.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.PinReader.pinpadFacade
member.summary: Facade through which pinpad communication is made.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.PinReader.readingMode
member.summary: Defines how data is read, according to card type.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.PinReader.#ctor(Pinpad.Sdk.EmvTable.IPinpadFacade,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.CardType)
member.summary: Reads pinblock and ksn and sets it's value into this class property. Is up to the user using these infos.
member.param: PinpadFacade mandatory to this class be able to communicate with the pinpad.
Card type, that is, the method physical in which the card should be read.
member.exception: Thrown when one parameter validation fails.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Transaction.PinReader.Read(System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: Reads Pin Block and Key Serial Number (KSN) from the card. If needed, prompts for cardholder password.
member.param: Primary Account Number, printed on the card.
member.returns: Whether is an online transaction or not.
member.exception: Thrown when a reading mode is unknown.

member.summary: Validates parameters sent to the constructor.
member.exception: When one parameter is not null, but contains invalid data.
